name: King's Game
description:
This is for a gamejam by TheGameDawg. Again, this is a little break before I release bigger projects. Hope you like~

It's like The Little Goatee in which it's like a text adventure... But longer~

This is a fangame to the popular Movie and Anime, "King's Game" but with an original cast and original story.

16 Students get a message from the "King" to perform tasks, and if they fail, they get eliminated.
